substep.name: Heat Oil
substep.description: In a skillet/pan, heat 2 tablespoons of the oil over medium-high heat

substep.name: Make Hash Brown
substep.description: Add frozen hash brown potatoes in an even layer; press down lightly.

substep.name: Cook Hash Brown-2
substep.description: Drizzle with remaining 1 tablespoon oil; turn.

substep.name: Cook Hash Brown-3
substep.description: Cook 6 to 8 minutes longer or until browned on both sides and hot throughout.

substep.name: Clean Up Hash Brown
substep.description: Transfer to a medium bowl; cover with foil to keep warm. Wipe out the skillet.

substep.name: Prepare Eggs
substep.description: In a large bowl, beat eggs, salt and pepper until well blended.

substep.name: Cook Saugages
substep.description: In the same skillet over medium-high heat, cook sausage 2 to 3 minutes, stirring frequently, until browned.

substep.name: Stir in Egg
substep.description: Stir in egg mixture; cook 2 to 3 minutes, stirring occasionally, until scrambled.

substep.name: Assemble Burritos
substep.description: To assemble burritos, spoon a line of hash browns down the center of each tortilla. Top with cheese and egg mixture.

substep.name: Finish
substep.description: Roll up each tortilla tightly to secure filling. Serve immediately, or freeze.
